reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous and sparkly, with a great fit that hits below the ankles.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress was a total hit!
items.body: This dress was a total hit! I bought a few options for a Christmas party and this one fit perfectly, like a glove. It has a little stretch, is very comfortable, and easy to wear all night. The material feels soft and flattering, and the color and pattern are absolutely beautiful in person. I received so many compliments and was extremely happy with my purchase. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: DFierros

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars OBSESSED! ðŸ˜
items.body: GET THE DRESS!! This dress is amazing. Itâ€™s a show stopper! Comfortable, stunning, travels super well. I just stuck it in my carry on and didnâ€™t have to worry about space for it or wrinkles. You just fold it up and go. Everyone was asking where I got it. Iâ€™m 5,7 145 and I fit perfectly in the medium. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Loved this dress and got tons of compliments
items.body: Loved this dress and got tons of compliments! Easy to wear, sparkly, looked like pictures, fit very nicely/flattering, but sequins did irritate my arms from rubbing. I am 5â€™6, 155, and wear 34DDD bra, and did not wear a bra. Even a strapless bra tended to peak up in the back, so wore nipple covers and tightened straps. Straps are adjustable and stayed where I adjusted them, which was great. There are some built-in, smallish round, thick pads in the bra area that caused slightly abnormal breast shape but not very noticeable. Would have been better without them but they are in between layers of fabric and not visible, so I felt that cutting them out would have been risky. Read more
items.author: LovesT

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite dress!
items.body: I don't write reviews unless I am completely blown away by a product. I was hesitant to buy a dress online, thinking it would be poorly made for the price. I was also concerned it would look like a costume or be too flashy for the formal wedding I ordered it for. This dress did not disappoint. I felt elegant, the sequined pattern is tasteful without being flashy. I received so many compliments! It is lined and comfortable. There isn't a built in bra, but I felt secure and covered. I didn't have any issue with the sequins scratching my arms as other reviewers have pointed out. It felt just as well made as any other dress I would get at the mall. I actually got stuck on a sharp spot on my chair (chair defect, not a reflection of the dress) and the dress did not snag or tear. I made it through the whole night without a wardrobe malfunction. I am 5'1", 115lbs and ordered a small. It fit well, but was a bit long for me- the length just skimmed the floor. I actually cannot wait to have an excuse to wear it again. Read more
items.author: Rianna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunningly Beautiful
items.body: This dress is STUNNING! It fits perfectly and is very comfortable. I wore this to a gala and got so many compliments. Read more
items.author: Vanity Cash

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the price at all
items.body: This dress is very poorly made, the design doesnâ€™t match up on the seams, the black material is super cheap and almost seems through. The straps wonâ€™t hold anything up bigger than a b cup. Donâ€™t bother. Read more
items.author: Charlene Ault

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great Color(s) but....
items.body: Beautiful dress. Comfortable despite the sequins which is great. You need a good strapless bra...better than the one I have anyway. Despite all of this, I'm returning the dress. It's looks good in person but doesn't look flattering in photos. I even ordered a size small then suggested by Anazon but the dress still didn't show off the curve of my waist and the reflection off the sequins make me look like i have a pooch. ðŸ˜ The blue/purple images show the larger size. The multi colored images show the smaller size. Read more
items.author: Jamie Sue Gormley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEAUTIFUL DRESS
items.body: I am 5â€™ 7 140 pounds and the medium fit me perfectly! This dress was beautiful in design and an outstanding value for the price! I received so many compliments and felt so beautiful. The fabric is high-quality. I had no issues with the sequence falling off, itchiness (most times with sequence this happens), uncomfortability, or the adjustments of the straps. I highly recommend the dress. Read more
items.author: Christina Plotner

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Evening Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Evening Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Evening Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Multicoloured, Wine, Silver, Blue Purple, Pink, Beige, Black Gold, Blue, Purple, Green Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
